featured.text: The style of the dances varies from region to region but is normally based on the rhythms of taiko drums.
Which of the following will probably NOT be found in the performance of Capoeira? (A) Singing with drums.

definition.zh_def: 鼓，一種用於打擊樂器的樂器，通常由圓形的膜和空心的箱體組成。
definition.en_def: A percussion instrument consisting of a hollow cylinder or shell with a membrane stretched over one or both ends, played by striking with sticks or hands.
definition.example: He played the drum in the school band.
